include.description: glob pattern for test files to include

exclude.description: glob pattern for test files to exclude

testNamePattern.description: Run only tests with a name that matches the given regex.

timeout.description: Set the per-test timeout in milliseconds, default is 5000.

rerunEach.description: Re-run each test file <NUMBER> times, helps catch certain bugs

todo.description: Include tests that are marked with "test.todo()"

only.description: Run only tests that are marked with "test.only()" or "describe.only()"

passWithNoTests.description: Exit with code 0 when no tests are found

seed.description: Set the random seed for test randomization

coverageReporter.description: Report coverage in 'text' and/or 'lcov'. Defaults to 'text'.

coverageDir.description: Directory for coverage files. Defaults to 'coverage'.

bail.description: Exit the test suite after <NUMBER> failures. If you do not specify a number, it defaults to 1.

reporter.description: Test output reporter format. Available: 'junit' (requires --reporter-outfile), 'dots'. Default: console output.

reporterOutfile.description: Output file path for the reporter format (required with --reporter).

onlyFailures.description: Only display test failures, hiding passing tests.

maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of concurrent tests to execute at once. Default is 20.

env.description: Environment variables to set for the test process
